item.description:
GIRLS NIGHT OUT!

On Thursday evening, January 25, 2007 WSRS 96.1 FM takes over
the Crowne Plaza Hotel for the entire evening for an event like no other!
7-10 p.m. Women only! 10 p.m. doors open men!

Girls Night Out is a great event for women that will include DJ, food, drinks, psychic readings, Worcester Sharks Players and the "slapshot contest", Worcester's Heroes that will be the "calendar heroes" for 2008 not to mention a male model contest guaranteed to keep your attention! All this and much more for a $5 entry fee. A portion of the fee will be donated to the Worcester Fire Fighters' Memorial Park Fund.

TO REGISTER TO WIN A GIRLS NIGHT OUT VIP PACKAGE FOR 20 WOMEN THAT INCLUDES LIMOS TO THE CROWNE PLAZA HOTEL, PAUL CONZO GIFT CARDS, FREE ADMITTANCE TO GNO VIP EXCLUSIVE RECEPTION FROM 6 - 7 P.M., A PAIR OF TICKETS TO BOB SEGER AT THE DCU CENTER IN WORCESTER ON JANUARY 30TH AND MORE; EMAIL THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION TO patriciachouinard@clearchannel.com TODAY!

NAME, ADDRESS, CITY, STATE, AND ZIP CODE, EMAIL ADDRESS, AND PHONE NUMBER.

So ladies, gather your girlfriends because you don't want to miss this event. It?s
time to break that cabin fever feeling and get out for a Girls Night Out!! A
WSRS 96.1 FM Girls Night Out!!
item.name: LADIES NIGHT ONLY TILL 10:00 CHARITY EVENT
